nodes.text: This unidentified red pit droid worked on Ratts Tyerell's podracer during the Boonta Eve Classic on Tatooine in 32 BBY.

This pit droid was made into an action figure by Hasbro and came with the exclusive Ratts Tyerell figure made for the Vintage Collection line. Some sources give the droid the nickname "Punctual," but this has not been confirmed in a canonical source.[source?]
